description.value:
Wondrous Item, Rare (Requires Attunement)
A gizzard pot takes the form of a large cauldron inscribed with runes and leering faces. If you boil the skull of a creature in this pot, you may cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.I2LUSF5ogc7Bj62e]{speak with dead} with that creature as a target. When cast in this manner, the skull must offer a truthful answer and speaks whatever languages you can speak. The pot cannot be used in this way again until the next dusk.
